body_html:
I'm aware of this behavior, consider it suboptimal, and I believe we should escalate this to Bazel. I've filed bazelbuild/bazel#3022. Please follow there for progress.

The workaround is to copy the stuff in your ~/.bazelrc into tensorflow/.bazelrc. Our configure script will not delete the file.

body:
I'm aware of this behavior, consider it suboptimal, and I believe we should escalate this to Bazel. I've filed https://github.com/bazelbuild/bazel/issues/3022. Please follow there for progress.

The workaround is to copy the stuff in your `~/.bazelrc` into `tensorflow/.bazelrc`. Our configure script will not delete the file.
